sources.title: The Truth About Romance
sources.description: Title: The Truth About Romance Summary: When Josh finally figures what he wants from life, it all comes crashing down. He then meets a girl who shows him that his adventure has only just begun. Directed by: James G. Wall Actors: Production Company: A Tiny Adventure Release Date: 8 June 2013 (UK) Aspect Ratio: REMOVE_TAG When Josh finally figures what he wants from life, it all comes crashing down. He then meets a girl who shows him that his adventure has only just begun.

metadata.Plot: When Josh finally figures what he wants from life, it all comes crashing down. He then meets a girl who shows him that his adventure has only just begun.
metadata.Actors: Jordan Greenhough, Danielle Bjelic, Craig Asquith
